adverb.description: In a way that is plain and characterized by a lack of decorative or other features.
examples: the suburbs that stretch blankly along the routes out from the city

adverb.description: In a way that shows a lack of interest or engagement.
examples: my home life consists of staring blankly at the television

adverb.description: In an absolute or blunt manner.
examples: the hospital has blankly refused to carry out tests
officials have stated blankly that they will never extradite the operatives
